channel.title: FPS drops
channel.description:
First of all, this is the most awesome mod i have ever played, NICE WORK!!!
But i experience som heavy fps drop's, it happens when i enter a new area, meet enemies or just when there is alot of action going on.. it can be as low as 20fps!?
My setup are: 3930K@4.7Ghz 16GB Ram HD 7970 Crossfire
I only play on one card, but why all this low fps? is it because its a earlier version of the Source engine? any settings/things i can do?
Thanks

item.title: FPS drops
